name: Dune Dashers
description:
Game submit for the Mini Jame Gam #15

2Players game in the same keyboard. 

Player 1 has a shovel and he digs the furrows. 

Player 2 has gloves and he clears the occupied squares

Pitch

You are two adventurers, you must, from a stream, dig and remove obstacles to bring water as far as possible through villages to collect more points.

Controls :

Player 1 (Shovel)

ZQSD : Movement

"Automatic :  Action (dig)"

Player 2 (Gloves)

Arrow : Movement

0(numpad) : Action (clear)
